languages.text: "Я согласился помочь из уважения к бесценному консорциуму Истинной плоти, помещенному в твое тело. Эти аугменты заслуживают наилучшего ухода".
"I agreed to help out of respect for the priceless array of augmentations placed in your body. Such sacred creations deserve the best maintenance available."
languages.original_text: "Я согласился помочь из уважения к бесценному консорциуму Истинной плоти, помещенному в твое тело. Эти аугменты заслуживают наилучшего ухода".

traits.locale_text: "I agreed to help out of respect for the priceless array of True Flesh placed in your body. Such augments deserve the best maintenance available."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I agreed to help out of respect for the priceless array of True Flesh placed in your body. Such augments deserve the best maintenance available."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I agreed to help out of respect for the priceless array of True Flesh placed in your body. Such augments deserve the best maintenance available."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I agreed to help out of respect for the priceless array of True Flesh placed in your body. Such augments deserve the best maintenance available."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我同意帮助你，是出于对你体内植入物的尊重。如此精致的造物，应该得到最细心的养护。”
languages.original_text: "I agreed to help out of respect for the priceless array of augmentations placed in your body. Such sacred creations deserve the best maintenance available."

traits.locale_text: “我同意帮助你，是出于对你体内植入物的尊重。如此精致的造物，应该得到最细心的养护。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai accepté de vous aider par respect pour les inestimables augmentations dans votre corps. De telles créations sacrées méritent d'être entretenues comme il se doit. »
languages.original_text: "I agreed to help out of respect for the priceless array of augmentations placed in your body. Such sacred creations deserve the best maintenance available."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai accepté de vous aider par respect pour les inestimables augmentations dans votre corps. De telles créations sacrées méritent d'être entretenues comme il se doit. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe aus Respekt vor der unschätzbar wertvollen Ansammlung von Augmentationen in Eurem Körper eingewilligt, Euch zu helfen. Solche heiligen Kreationen verdienen die bestmögliche Wartung."
languages.original_text: "I agreed to help out of respect for the priceless array of augmentations placed in your body. Such sacred creations deserve the best maintenance available."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe aus Respekt vor der unschätzbar wertvollen Ansammlung von Wahrem Fleisch in Eurem Körper eingewilligt, Euch zu helfen. Solche Augmentationen verdienen die bestmögliche Wartung."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「私は、あなたの肉体に宿っている希少なインプラントへの敬意から、協力することに同意した。このような神聖な創造物には、最高のメンテナンスが必要だ」
languages.original_text: "I agreed to help out of respect for the priceless array of augmentations placed in your body. Such sacred creations deserve the best maintenance available."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、あなたの肉体に宿っている希少なインプラントへの敬意から、協力することに同意した。このような神聖な創造物には、最高のメンテナンスが必要だ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «He aceptado ayudarle por respeto a los preciados aumentos que hay en su cuerpo. Esas creaciones sagradas merecen el mejor mantenimiento».
languages.original_text: "I agreed to help out of respect for the priceless array of augmentations placed in your body. Such sacred creations deserve the best maintenance available."

traits.locale_text: «He aceptado ayudarle por respeto a los preciados aumentos que hay en su cuerpo. Esas creaciones sagradas merecen el mejor mantenimiento».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I agreed to help out of respect for the priceless array of augmentations placed in your body. Such sacred creations deserve the best maintenance available."

languages.text: "Vücuduna yerleştirilmiş paha biçilmez ogmentasyon dizisine hürmeten yardım etmeyi kabul ettim. Böylesi kutsal icatlar itinalı bakımı hak eder."
languages.original_text: "I agreed to help out of respect for the priceless array of augmentations placed in your body. Such sacred creations deserve the best maintenance available."

traits.locale_text: "Vücuduna yerleştirilmiş paha biçilmez ogmentasyon dizisine hürmeten yardım etmeyi kabul ettim. Böylesi kutsal icatlar itinalı bakımı hak eder."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
